span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 类似的；具有相似或相近的起源，本性或性质的： having a similar or related origin, nature, or character
【例】 finally found people who were kindred spirits when she joined the hiking club 她加入登山俱乐部的时候终于发现了志向相同的人
【近】 agreeable, amicable, compatible, congenial, frictionless, unanimous, united
【反】 disagreeable, discordant, disharmonious, disunited, incompatible, inharmonious, uncongenial 不一致不和谐的

【记】 kind + red 血红→同样的血→同族
